column2: [Root.GetDynName] is under the effects of a Potion of Fortify Magicka, which increases [Root.GetHerHis] Maximum Magicka by 20
[Root.GetDynName] is under the effects of a Potion of Magicka Regeneration, greatly increasing their Magicka Regeneration Rate
Imbibe a Potion of Fortify Magicka, greatly increasing your Magicka for a limited time.
Increases §YMaximum Magicka§! by 20\n(This is equivalent to wearing an §YAmulet of Julianos§!.)
Imbibe a Potion of Magicka Regeneration, greatly increasing your Magicka Regeneration Rate for a limited time.
Increases §YMagicka Regeneration Rate§! by a rather large amount\n(The exact increase varies between characters but is equivalent to wearing an §YAmulet of Akatosh§!.)
